venue.name: Horse Hill Nature Preserve, just past

item.description: Liz was nice to share information about Horse Hill Nature Preserve. Its 563 acres of land, open to hikers, bikers, horseback riders and others. Go to the website listed and find out more, and download a trail map. We'll be doing the Loop trail. (3.9 miles with lots of side trails to take.) 2 to 2 1/2 hours hiking time. We'll meet at 184 Amherst Road parking lot. ( I Mapquested this out and it did work ) It should be fun. This is a pet friendly park. Thank you Liz.
item.how_to_find_us: Tan Chevy Tracker "WOOF" sticker on back. Parking/Trail head on 184 Amherst RD

group.name: Human Soles & Doggie Paws Hikers & Walkers of Manchester, NH

item.name: Horse Hill Nature Preserve
